description: Two Boom compatible (cl9) levels for Doom 2. Quite challenging maps on UV (harder then Plutonia maps on skill 4), more manageable on lower skill settings. It features the low life Cybers Ribbiks created, which have 700 hp in this wad (a full credit list of the resources used is present in the text file). Cooperative gameplay is implemented.

name: The Vamp
description:
A short story about a vampire who breaks into a man's house at night ...
You can play as Yumi (the vampire) or the man.
Your goal: obtain the best grade. But it's not really necessary. You can also get all possible notes, and all endings, for a total of 26 endings.

name: Just Button
description:
Just Button is incredibly simple. You tap the button, and the number goes up. It is, after all, just a button.

Join the slowly unfolding adventure of Just Button. Tap and watch the number go up before the button takes on a mind of its own! Worlds of adventure await you!

name: Jacob's Room
description: Your friend has invited you to hang out, but there isn't actually much to do at his place. Interact with items and talk to Jacob to learn more about him!

name: Idle Ark: Sail and Build
description: Idle Arks: Sail and Build is a unique game where you are like in the movie "Waterworld" on your own one of the few ships in the world sailing in search of a new home. The player places blocks to build a ship, which must be placed correctly, so as not to collide with other ships and objects. You can build a mast, deck, sails, hull, rigging and rudder. Blocks can also be used to place cannons, anchors and even a submarine. To indicate in which direction to sail, you must place a flag. After placing all the blocks you can set sail by choosing the direction and speed. You can control the ship with the arrow keys. The up and down keys change the sails, and the keys left and right to change the rudder. The game will please and mini-game in which you can take part in a sea battle against enemy ships, shooting at them with guns. A bonus for destroying blocks will be the opportunity to win additional ships.

name: Clock Tower: Ready for the Next
description: Jennifer, a young girl trapped in a Western-style house inhabited by a killer, tries to escape in the horror adventure "CLOCK TOWER".

name: Intern: An Intern's Guide to Maintaining Internal Rage
description:
Welcome to your first day at *redacted*! This new employee guide comes to you directly from the Far Corner Devs.

We here at *redacted* thank you for joining our family. You may have heard people refer to this job as: monotonous, passion devouring or a complete waste of shareholder funds.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Rodnye Prostory Route
description: A detailed 58km route set in the 'Commonwealth of Independent States' region of Eurasia, with 38km of single track and 9km of double track.

name: Plague Infection
description: Plague Infection is a Bomberman game, at its best. Lay out the flasks with explosives, and clear your way. You need to collect all the vaccines while there is still time to defeat the disease. But be careful there are zombies everywhere.

name: Dawn Will Come
description:
It's dark. How long has it been dark?

Monsters prowl everywhere, supplies are scarce. Decide your tasks, carry them out, find more survivors to help, fight back the creatures that emerge from the Night. You must survive, because surely Dawn Will Come.

name: The Fall of Prometheus
description: The Fall of Prometheus is a Greek mythology themed adventure game made for the MSX

name: Culino
description: Culino takes you to a world made of cubes and lines and helps you get away from your daily stress and anxiety because by connecting those lines you obtain that piano sound effect and experience that good feeling of calm and tranquility. Remember that you, yourself, shall find the way to making the lines meet! There are no formulas, there are no hints, it's all about lines union.

name: Minion Masters + Mordar's Malediction DLC
description: Bundle of Minion Masters and the Mordar's Malediction DLC for Xbox.

name: Endure
description: Endure is psychological horror experience exploring the human mind and the effects psychedelics can have on a damaged one.

name: Survival Zone
description: Rich levels, in-depth gameplay, and diverse turrets. In the game, you will use your turret to defend against a variety of enemies.

name: Ball.io
description: Shoot and survive, Play with other people online.

name: Movers in the Warehouse
description: Movers in the Warehouse is a puzzle game about workers in a warehouse with strategy and arcade elements, made in a 2D drawn style.

name: Sokobear: Winter
description: Sokobear is the spa's maintenance bear, his job is to turn on the heating and massage system of all the natural pools in this winter spa.

name: Kingdom of Heroes
description: An RPG game that grows by defeating monsters to level up and making a variety of items.

name: One Fateful Night
description: One Fateful Night is a horror game where the player attempts to survive the night inside a scientific research base that has appeared mysteriously. The player must explore and use things they find to survive and escape.

name: Sorcerer Knights
description: Fight terrible enemies through a varied fantasy world.

name: The Elm Game
description: A board game for two players that is easy to learn yet hard to master, played on a stylized tree stump. The computer can substitute for a second player at any time.

name: Cubyrinth
description: Cubyrinth is a 3D puzzle game. Will you be able to navigate and find the correct solution in the labyrinth located on the 6 sides of the cube? This game will provide you with an infinite number of auto-generated 3D labyrinths!

name: TitTok
description: TitTok - Minimalistic adventure 2D puzzle platformer with cats, explosions and spinning saws!

name: I Love Finding Cats
description: I Love Finding Cats is a classic Hidden Object game. Explore a variety of different hidden object scenes, lots of minigame puzzles and most importantly collect all the adorable cats!

name: Grottonnia
description: A collection of minigames that engage and utilize your 3D play space in fun and unique ways.

name: City of Cards
description: City of Cards takes the best aspects of City Builders and Deckbuilding Card Games, then fuses it into something completely new and innovative. Build cities, watch them thrive, respond to various exciting events, assemble your own custom deck and create your City of Cards!

name: Mind Space
description: FPS with rouge like rpg elements. Made by one solo indie game developer.

name: Skattered Dream
description: A Difficult Platformer, Skattered Dream is a tribute to the classic games of the 80's. It may look dated but this little game that still could can pack a serious punch. Its not easy to survive in this world but boy is it fun!

name: Universe 25: The Loop
description: A Pythonesque Indie point and click adventure game set in the year 2035. Follow the journey of a bureaucrat as he tracks down a malevolent force running experiments on citizens. Armed with a government issue briefcase and a pet mouse, he tracks down an evil agent only to find more than he expected

name: Neko Hacker Plus
description: Hack all the pictures by solving ChanOS puzzles!

name: Zombies Beyond Me
description: Here you can lie. Zombies Beyond Me is a deduction, survival, and third-person action game set in a post-apocalyptic world. Communication and teamwork are essential to win, either as a traitor or a survivor. Build, loot, discover, kill zombies (or people), and survive to win!

name: Bean Stalker
description: Be the stalker of this new realm. Explorative, random world challenges in the setting of an exciting vertical world of beanstalks. With the Blade Slammer become more than a new hunter. Hunt creatures and adapt to a new way of vertical life. Evolve, create, develop to be the most skilled among all.

name: Sumple
description: Take a seat back and explore a vast and beautiful world. Find out why it became so empty. And get inspired by all the stories that helped others in the past. But also don't let your guard down because revenge is the reason you were summoned here.

name: Lustful Tribe
description: This ironic ero-game is about fun adventures and joyful sex: сollect hentai girls, fight them in nostalgic battles, romance them, complete ridiculous tasks, play through the non-linear story – and conquer the Lustful Tribe!

name: Protect the Earth
description: You are the best pilot in the space force and the earth needs you to protect itself from an alien attack. Protect the earth and then go to the invader's planet to finish them off once and for all.

name: Peppy's Adventure
description: Peppy’s Adventure is a 1-screen, top-down, action-puzzle game controlled with directional inputs only. You control Peppy, a bun-shaped bunny, on his journey to rescue the village younglings from the clutches of the Hooded Fox. As you pursue his airship, you will have to solve your way through short challenging levels as fast as possible facing an army of reckless foxes.

name: Pillow Bellow
description: Have you ever wonder why you have bad sleep? In Pillow Bellow you will take a role as a Pillow that have to save humans from bad sleep. But the path will be not easy. There are unique traps, secrets and skins for you to find. Lets save the Pillow World!

name: Unknown Woods
description: A brutal horror action FPS where you will be fighting for survival against creatures of the woods and finding out the mysteries that lye around in the dark forest

name: Kena: Bridge of Spirits
description: Kena: Bridge of Spirits is a 2021 action-adventure video game developed and published by Ember Lab. The story follows Kena, a young spirit guide who uses her magical abilities to help deceased people move from the physical to the spirit world. The game is presented through a third-person perspective. The player uses Kena's staff for attacking enemies, and her pulse ability for defending against attacks. They are tasked with collecting small spirit companions known as the Rot, who help to complete tasks and battle against enemies.

name: Unforgiven: Carry The Pain
description: Broken... Shattered... On a journey to redemption... Carrying the pain of his past errors... Seeking forgiveness by accepting a quest bestowed upon him by the King to cleanse the Underworld from an ancient evil... also giving him a chance for revenge from the one causing the pain in the first place...

name: Crime Life Crime Wave
description: some thoughts about an old video game and game maker and playing games as a young child

name: Age of DOOM
description: A remake of Doom II set in the world of Age of Empires II

name: You are a slave!
description: You are a slave! is a first-person adventure. In this game you are taken into slavery. For fear of death, you decide to escape from the castle with the help of your new friend. You will need to solve puzzles and complete various tasks to escape from the castle.

name: Wager
description: Wager is roguelike about winning a game of dice against a hacker goose.

name: Domynyo
description: Post-apocalyptic and Abandonment are the protagonists of the 1st Season. Dark locations and abandoned places in a 4k world. The day-night cycle and climate conditions will influence the game to the point that you could find yourself in the dark seeking for a torch and praying for the storm to end.

name: Report One: Operation Alive
description:
Report One: Operation Alive is a Half-Life modification from the Report series, a story about Kyle Rodriguez, a corporal who will go through blood and sweat, but will overcome the opponents.

Kyle will meet old friends, and the good old villain Mason. He will also fight the mercenaries, and prove that the soldiers do not eat bread for nothing, eventually saving everyone!

name: 40 Minute-r
description: This is a 14 map vanilla compatible wad where each map is made in about 40 minutes.

name: Linux Jank
description: A collection of maps that are short, sweet, and to the point. This wad is called Linux Jank as a reference to my learning all the strange quirks of Eureka Editor.

name: Atrocity Arise
description: Large Knave-textured castle with libraries and a courtyard. The map source is included.

name: Anna-san tachi no Fushigi no meikyuu
description: Anna-san tachi no Fushigi no meikyuu is a roguelike game produced by Capricorn.

name: Aisu Kuriimu Simulator
description: Ice Cream Simulator is a game about making ice cream.

name: Spin Squared
description: Gravity-defying puzzle platformer with a unique twist on world rotation. Navigate through 8 episodes of frantic gameplay and challenging rotation puzzles.

name: 69 Erika Love
description: 69 Erika Love - Play an exciting puzzle game with Erika. Everyone's beloved Miss Erica stays after class especially for you. Collect all the pieces of the puzzle and open the reward. Relaxing music and meditative gameplay will allow to have a good rest after work .

name: Sweet Match 3
description: Sweet Match 3 is a simple match 3 game. Drag and drop the candy and get a high score. Made in Construct 3. Enjoy your game!The game has nice graphics and music.Collect as many Jelly as you can and get the most points.Forward!

name: Monica's Revenge Tragedy
description: Boyish heroine Monica sets out to take revenge. The abuse is frantic in each and the animation is a must-see.

name: Rabbids at Versailles
description:
The Rabbids have invaded the gardens of Versailles!
It's up to you to fix the damages and flush them out!

A game in augmented reality and playable only in the Gardens of the Palace of Versailles.
This original treasure hunt will allow visitors, young and old, to explore the Gardens in a fun and educational way, on the trail of a mysterious Rabbid Louis XIV. In the alleys, the flowerbeds or near the basins of the French gardens, play and find the Rabbids to discover the largest outdoor museum in a new light.
This application is published by the Palace of Versailles and was created thanks to a sponsorship from Ubisoft. Intended for children from 8 years old, this application allows you to discover the Gardens while having fun.
It is only available to download in France, playable at the Gardens of the Palace of Versailles.

name: Surgical Robot Simulator
description: A real surgical robot simulation game, observe human organs from the inside of the abdominal cavity, and use various instruments to grasp, cut and clip the organs freely to complete the real operation. Be careful not to bleed. Challenge to complete all levels from simple to difficult

name: Where's My Lunch?!
description: Where's My Lunch?! is an action stealth adventure game, with the quest of finding your lunch during the zombie apocalypse. Use impromptu weapons such as rakes, vacuums, wax machines, good ole Sally, and more! Set up zombies in environmental traps to help you move closer to your glorious lunch.

name: Axilon: Legend of Artifacts - Prologue
description: Axilon: Legend of Artifacts - Prologue is a first-person fantasy action RPG game. Awaken your true power and resist the forces of evil that are trying to destroy your world.

name: Sputnik
description: Sputnik is an indie arcade space game where player needs to repair old Soviet Union Space Settlements. It's a singleplayer game with cyberpunk style graphics and real retro feel. Gameplay is based on old school games from 1980's and 1990's with lives and permadeath.

name: Trap Genesis
description: Finally, a new universe is here! The great finale of the ten years history of the "Trap" series. This is the creation myth of the birth of a blessed world where Gods, men, and crossdressers can love each other freely!

name: Train Travel Simulator
description: Simulator of travel in the carriage of a passenger train across Russia.

name: Squabble
description: Choose your favourite sibling character and own others in-game. Attack your opponents or play defensively, use the environment to your advantage. Trap your opponents or just get rid of them in the old-fashioned way. Be mindful of your surrounding as the world around you changes and reveals its not-so-friendly face. You can play in a party of 4 players in the local multiplayer and fight for the ultimate victory. Game characters are children siblings fighting each other as they always do using any means necessary - exploding pillows, water guns, by unleashing monsters and also with the worst thing ever - their homework. The desire to win is great, following squabble is even greater. Let's dive into atmosphere of pixel art couch playstyle. With your skill growing there comes even bigger passion for win. Explore vivid rooms, extremely dangerous and be ready to squabble!

name: Remute: Living Electronics
description: Remute enters the most popular portable game console of all time - the Game Boy! His new album 'Living Electronics' comes exclusively as a cartridge for Nintendo's evergreen handheld and contains 15 new songs full of bleepy bliss.

name: Frostpunk Pico
description:
A demake of Frostpunk for PICO-8.

Welcome to the frigid wastes of Northern England. The world is cooling, London is in disarray, and there is no end in sight. You are charged with helping your group of refugees survive the cold. This task will be daunting and dangerous, but you are not without hope.

name: Deltarune: Chapter 1 & 2
description: The award-winning indie RPG, Undertale, expands the series with a brand new game...in a different world! Create your own avatar, meet strange friends, and jump into the darkness. The first two chapters are free, so what are you waiting for? And more (paid) chapters will come out as soon as we finish them, so keep an eye out! For years!

name: Pokémon Crystal Advance Redux
description:
Pokémon Crystal Advance Redux is an exciting unofficial remake of the classic game Pokémon Crystal, meticulously crafted to bring a fresh and enhanced experience to trainers. This game takes all the beloved elements of the original Crystal version and infuses it with a host of new features, abilities, and moves, creating a captivating journey through the Johto region.

One of the notable additions in Pokémon Crystal Advance Redux is the introduction of new abilities and attacks. Trainers can now strategize and exploit their Pokémon's unique abilities to gain an edge in battles. With a revamped move set that incorporates moves from the fourth generation, players have an expanded arsenal of powerful attacks at their disposal, making battles even more intense and dynamic.

name: Five Nights At Your Mom's House
description:
So you need to work at Your Mom's House.
but some people want to come by and Kill You.

name: Island Clicker
description:
Welcome to Island Clicker – where every click opens the door to an unexplored world!

Explore the Island: Chop down your first tree, crack open your first stone, and step by step, delve deeper into the mysteries of this enigmatic island. The further you venture, the more resources you find, and with each upgraded tool, you become even stronger!

Tame Loyal Companions: Don’t face this adventure alone! Find and tame a monkey to work tirelessly by your side, a wolf ready to tear through your enemies, or a cat that brings you the kind of luck you’ve only dreamed of.

What Do the Shadows Hide?: The island is filled with secrets – from a strange broken totem by the lake to a mysterious bunker hidden among the trees. What are these places, and how can you access them? What secrets do they hold? Perhaps the answers lie behind doors that are still locked. Can you unravel all the mysteries that this land holds?

name: Harvest Them
description: You are the sole necromancer living in the surrounding forest of a small village. You have remained dormant for many years but your hunger has awakened you and you must feed on the souls of the living. You gather souls within your Wellheart and must not let it be destroyed. The surrounding area is filled with monsters that come out at night. They will be drawn towards your Wellheart, and attempt to destroy it. Villagers hide at night and move about during the day. The village lies to the south east of your Wellheart. There are four monster dens around the forest. Defend your Wellheart at night and feed during the day.

name: New Super Mario Bros. U but the Floor is Lava
description: Every Level from Acorn Plains to Superstar Road but the floor is lava.

name: Brawl Chess: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Umokay 64DS
description:
Umokay 64DS is a romhack of Super Mario 64 DS based on a discord emote called umokay and its many variations.

It is a series of minihacks each containing several levels to explore and a custom final boss to offer. Each installment's story is a follow up to the previous.

name: Starlit Kart Racing
description:
Come show your skills as a pilot and your intelligence to use the super powers of karts! With this perfect combination, you will be the great Starlit Kart champion!

Adrenaline fuels the mind-boggling races between heroes and villains from Starlit Adventures! Do you dare to join this team?

name: Oktoberfest Break: Head to Head
description: Oktoberfest Break Head to Head is a retro arcade game that lets 1 and 2 players play head to head in a competitive arcade environment. Unique animated Oktoberfest themed items tumble down toward the users paddle along with Mini-Bosses and Powerups. Collect powerups as you progress through the levels and defeat your opponent. Thirty Levels to compete in and battle mini bosses on your way to victory in single player and two player modes.

name: Abysm 2: Pharaoh's Judgement
description: Abysm 2: Pharaoh's Judgement is an Expansion for the GZDoom mod Abysm 2: Infernal Contract. Includes a new singleplayer Campaign with new Weapons, Monsters and Quests.

name: Galactic Invasion
description: Aliens are invading the Galaxy. Your job, if you accept it, Major, is to stop them. Galactic Invasion will make you enjoy gameplay of old school shoot'em up with today's device capabilities. Fire!

name: Friday Night Funkin': Vs Ankha
description: Vs. Ankha is a mod by Akirawave, the mod is based on a popular character from Zone Ankha and from Animal Crossing franchise. The mod has 3 Songs.

name: Jigsaw Finale
description: Your favorite jigsaw puzzle game is back!

name: Secret Agent Game: The 5 Keys
description: Secret Agent Game: The 5 Keys is a point and click adventure game unlike anything you have ever played before. Why? Because of this simple concept. “Why do so many game developers try to make computer games look like ‘real life’ when you can make ‘real life’ play like a computer game? “ The result is a masterpiece that has the charm of the classic point and click adventure games with the realism of being in a movie. It's Interactive video but it's taken to a whole new exciting level of interactions. CG Entertainment brings together skillsets from movie making, 3d animation and coding to create an immersive interactive world.

name: Grid Autosport: Custom Edition
description: Take the irresistible mix of simulation and arcade handling of GRID Autosport for a free test drive. Then, whenever you are ready, customise the experience with additional paid content packs to take your pro-racing career to the next level.

name: Temple Run: Puzzle Adventure
description:
Play TEMPLE RUN as never before! Beat match 3 puzzles to uncover the mysteries of the ancient temple realm. Create powerful combos and use special pieces to become a Temple Champion!
Assist the great adventurer, archeologist and Temple Runner Scarlett Fox as you solve puzzles to overcome the mysterious obstacles along your path.

name: Little Christmas Adventure
description: Sin descripción

name: Shaman
description: Shaman is a third-person action-adventure game where you assume the role of a young Shaman amidst a great cataclysm. Seek out the ancient secrets of your people and gain the ability to Shapeshift into the mighty Jaguar, cast fireballs and incinerate your foes, and unlock the ability to lift objects at a distance.

name: Tile Connect: Onet Match
description: Tile Connect: Onet Match is a super fun matching game with cool challenges and brain teasers! Enjoy hours of fun connecting lovely images. Test your skills by matching and linking the same kind of images and work your way up to victory!

name: The Hunt
description: The name says it all - in The Hunt, you get, well, hunted by hunters who will do everything they can to hunt you down. In order to survive, you must explore, scavenge, craft, and fight in order to survive. And if you survive and scavenge for long enough, there might just be a way to escape.

name: Zombie Hunter
description: Take your guns and start killing zombies in the best FPS Shooting game

name: GHD
description: GHD: It is a multiplayer shooter. Where it puts the players in the face of some of them. And the winning team gets points and coins. There are five game modes. There are many weapons to pick up. This game is different from all games where the battle environment gives a very beautiful impression

name: Billiards Legend: Black 8 Miracle
description: This is the most challenging billiards game. Exquisite graphics quality, Sidespin, masse, jump ball! Enjoy the billiard ball collision!

name: Loop Timer
description: A timer cycle permanently

name: Synthwaifu: Neon Space Fighter
description: Synthwaifu: Neon Space Fighter is inspired by the arcade games of the 80s. Destroy waves of enemy spaceships to score points and unlock all the drawings.

name: Project: Cow
description: A strategy game focused on stealth mode, your objective is to escape from the Spaceship hiding in hiding places without the Aliens noticing your movement. Be patient with the cow grandma, the poor thing is old and doesn't move so quickly.

name: Love Colors: All in One
description: Love Colors - All in One Pack Includes DLC 1 - Happy Pixels features and DLC 2 - Pixel Adventurer.

name: Love Colors: Happy Pixels
description: Happy Pixels features 130+ new images including yummy sweets, exciting sports and vehicles, farming, emotes as well as festive periods for Christmas and Halloween.

name: Love Colors: Pixel Adventurer
description: Pixel Adventurer includes 110+ new images in new categories and takes you on a world tour painting iconic scenes like the Eiffel Tower, Big Ben and Sydney Opera House as well as other majestic citiescapes and beautiful landscapes.

name: Neon Arena
description: Neon Arena is a space arcade scoring arena game.

name: The Island of Dr. Yepstein
description: The Island of Dr. Yepstein - an uncompromising first-person action shooter that takes place on a paradise tropical island. The player in the role of a super-cool commando will have to meet face to face with dangerous enemies and solve all the secrets of the mysterious island.

name: Drag Engineer
description: If you are interested in programming, you will like the game. You will play an engineer, use the mouse to drag various instructions to write programs, and let them run normally to meet the requirements of the boss. Some levels test your logic ability very much. Please think carefully before you act.

name: Your Show Has Been Cancelled
description: Your favorite show has been cancelled due to unbelievable circumstances. Take down foes who dare to get in your way in randomly-generated dungeon levels as you adventure to figure out what really happened and bring back your show!

name: Skotos
description: Grab your Lantern and plunge into the darkness of Skotos, a terrifying first-person platforming game that will make you brave the darkness to survive.

name: The Repairing Mantis
description: The Repairing Mantis is a narrative horror game that lets you experience the disturbing, violent nightmare of a mantis on a mission to repair a bridge made of flying squirrel flesh.

name: Cursed Night: The House
description: 1972, Texas. One night, you had a car accident near the Stafford farm. You wanted to get help, so you went there. But it was your worst decision of your life. What after came...it was the real CURSED NIGHT for you.

name: SpaceXplorer
description: Desktop and VR interactive space experience/game. Fan homage to SpaceX's efforts of inspiring humanity to finally become a spacefaring civilization! Experience launches, flights and landings of starships first-hand, engage with challenging mini-games, explore funny memes and more. :-)

name: Helper Cat
description: Helper cat is a puzzle game, in which your objective is to help a magician, putting his potions in the correct places, but for that you'll have to face all the puzzles in the castle.

name: Demon Lord Jill: Revival
description: “Jill”‘s family is a two hundred thousand years-lasted Demon consanguinity. But Jill was in deep trouble as his father passed away. The number of demons and humans were decreasing.

name: Robogal
description: This is a role-playing game. In the game, you will play the role of bio robot manufacturer. Through the data collection of prototype, you can make the robot customers want.

name: First Class Escape: The Train of Thought
description: "First Class Escape: The Train of Thought" is a co-operative atmospheric escape room puzzle game, set in a beautifully realized vintage train. Do you think you have what it takes to solve the puzzles and escape the train?

name: Kick Ball
description: Kick Ball is a puzzle-style game, in which the player will have to go through challenges such as saws, thorns, bombs in order to reach the goal.

name: Mechanica: A Ballad of the Rabbit and Mercury
description: 5029 AD, "Guillotine", the Japanese territory on Mercury, a city full of neon signs and drunks. You will explore the beautiful cyberpunk-style 2D world, play music to the residents of Mercury to gather intelligence, and finally achieve the goal of saving the world.

name: Voidwalkers: The Gates of Hell
description: You are one of the Voidwalkers, tasked with a life-long oath to defend the Gates Of Hell from any who would try to cross into the land of the living. After a thousand years without incident, thousands of undead warriors have begun crossing the plane, and it's up to you to stop them!

name: Tales of a Rabbit: The Story of Willie Hop
description: Tales of a Rabbit: The Story of Willie Hop is a 3D educational platformer about an adventurous rabbit on a grand treasure hunt! This short 3D platformer is designed to teach players how to solve math problems that deal with the order of operations, one-step equations, and two-step equations.

name: Sit Down, Please
description: Step into a scientist's shoes in a story driven game which leads you to discover a mysterious and unknown world by torturing characters. In order to find out all the hidden secrets, try to keep the guinea pigs alive for as long as possible by using the scientist's machinery.

name: Mandinga: A Tale of Banzo
description: Mandinga: A tale of Banzo is a role-playing game with game style of Japanese RPG classics, with a unique battle system using dice in turn-based combat, full of strategy and challenges. A game with an immersive history, based on a historical moment in Brazil.

name: Deltarune: Chapter 2
description:
Deltarune: Chapter 2 is the next installment of the sequel to beloved indie darling Undertale...in a different world! This time around, two more classmates join the protagonists in their adventure as they, too, discover a mysterious world hidden behind a door, called the "Cyber World".

Players with no save data will be able to start right at Chapter 2. “As long as you generally remember what happened story-wise, you’ll be fine,” the developers said in an FAQ.

name: Evan Quest
description: EVAN QUEST - Bad Dudes have taken over New York City. The DoD sends in Evan Quest to stop them. Save the Hostages and clear the Bad Dudes from several progressively challenging levels.

name: Love Colors
description: Love Colors is the relaxing paint by numbers pixel art game. Choose from over 150 stylish paintings from lovable themes and become the Picasso of the pixel. Playable solo and up to 4-player couch co-op.

name: Argus Panoptes
description: A 2D platformer with engaging, physics-based mechanics in an unforgiving world. Collect the eyes of Argus Panoptes to complete the levels in this dystopian take on mythology.

name: PalmRide
description: PalmRide is a fast-paced driving game inspired by classic games like OutRun or Rad Racer and the popular "outrun" style.

name: Bad Bots Battle Arena
description: Enjoy Battle Bot Style Of Robot Fighting In Wide Battle Arena!

name: Street Dreams
description: Street Dreams is a fast-paced VR action FPS set in a psychedelic dream world. Evade opponents in a high-speed car chase using a variety of weapons at your disposal.

name: Arctictopia
description: Arctictopia is a puzzle-solving game in the Arctic Ocean. Figure out routes and plan your moves to help mama polar bear find her cub on the melting ice.

name: The Architect's Game
description: The Architect's Game is a series of online party and deception gamemodes for 4 to 10 players in which you either play the rules or try to check how deep the rabbit's hole goes.

name: Dark Thrones / Witch Hunter Double Pack
description: This Dark Thrones/Witch Hunter Double Pack brings you 2 endless runner games in one box.

name: Tails of Iron: Crimson Knight Edition
description:
Tails of Iron is an epic RPG Adventure with punishingly brutal combat. As Redgi, heir to the Rat Throne, you must embark on a perilous quest to reclaim your Kingdom. Explore a deceivingly charming world. Assemble a band of brave companions. Banish the merciless Frog clan…once and for all!

Crimson Knight Edition includes:

- Base Game
- 3 x Armour Skins
- 3 x Helmet Skins
- 3 x Weapon Skins
- 3 x Shield Skins

name: Puerto Viejo
description: Puerto Viejo is a delightful story set during the Spanish Golden Age. You play as Miguel, a young boy on a quest to follow his father’s steps. Explore the city and its surroundings while meeting a colorful cast of characters along the way.

name: Blockdown
description: Roll around on a wibbly wobbly grid through space. This peaceful puzzler is a 3D twist on a classic 2D game.

name: Rhythm Knights
description: Rhythm Knights is a unique, musical rhythm game about a group of ragtag knights seeking vengeance on an evil king who destroyed their home. The king bear hired 8 evil monsters to stop you from seeking your revenge! Click the notes as they come down to take down your foes!

name: My name is human
description: My name is human - is a new 2D guest-clicker where you will have to do different quests playing like a robot.

name: Severed Steel
description: Severed Steel is a stylish and visceral single-player FPS featuring a fluid stunt system, destructible voxel environments, loads of bullet time, a unique one-armed protagonist, and a dark electronic soundtrack.

name: Two Coins
description: Two Coins is a time-traveling action adventure. You play as Richard, a guy with a completely normal life. He finds a magazine about forests and wilderness at work and is inspired to go on a forest trip.

name: Crysis Remastered Trilogy
description: The classic first person shooter from Crytek is back with the action-packed gameplay, sandbox world, and thrilling epic battles you loved the first time around – now with remastered graphics optimized for a new generation of hardware.

name: Good Knight
description: One button bullet hell game. Use your agility and quickness to dodge bullets. Battle in different mysterious hells against giant bosses. Featuring stunning visual impact, and original metal soundtracks.

name: Hisato No Saku
description: Hisato No Saku is a retro, GameBoy inspired, turn-based fighter. Take on the role of Hisato, the village elder, as he guards the gate awaiting the arrival of the town's young warriors. Decide who enters, turn away those who would do the village harm. But be careful, because all strangers won't leave willingly.

name: Festival Tycoon
description:
Create and manage your own music festival empire. Book bands, setup stages, organise your line-up, layout tents and portaloos, roll out the food trucks and build your festival’s reputation to appease sponsors and earn big bucks.

In Festival Tycoon, booking bands, setting up stages, organizing the line-ups, layout tents and portaloos is some of the many mechanics one will need to master to build the festival of their dreams.

Players will be able to create, design, and manage their own music festival empire, starting from humble beginnings in tiny fields to a Coachella-sized event.

A fusion of builder, management and RTS, Festival Tycoon is all about hosting the wildest festival the world has ever seen in adorable, colourful voxels.

Features:
🎪 Design the optimal festival layout: Place tents, VIP bungalows, glamorous stages, portaloos, festival decorations and more!
🎸Book talent and arrange a stellar line-up: Put your bargaining skills and musical taste to the test by hiring a range of bands across the likes of folk, rock and techno.
🎫 Attract sponsors and sell tickets: Appease sponsors like banks, record labels and drink companies for grants.
🤩 Keep the crowds happy: Be wary of your attendees' satisfaction, as unhappy punters are quick to take to social media and ruin your reputation!

name: Aragami 2
description: Aragami 2 is a third person stealth game where you play as an assassin with the power to control the shadows. Join the shadow clan and fight the invider armies to protect your people.

name: Toem
description:
An aesthetic adventure with the premise of enjoying the little things!
Toem is an adventure game, it aims to capture the curiosity of a child! Should I go left, right, who cares I'm on an adventure! Your smile, that's what's important to us.

name: Plunder Panic
description: Plunder Panic is a swashbuckling, up to 12-person local multiplayer arcade game where two rival crews battle for supremacy on the high seas. Defeat the enemy captain, scuttle their ship, plunder enough booty or end up shark bait in Davy Jones’ Locker!

name: Zombie Watch
description: Open world single player / CO-OP survival sandbox game with zombies and wildlife.

name: Maimai DX Universe Plus
description:
Updated release of maimai DX UNiVERSE.

General Information / Changes:
"Invitation Play" introduced, where another player can play the BASIC difficulty of the song being played on the unused side of the cabinet for free (once per day).
- If both have cleared the song (80% or above), the player who initiated the invitation gets a boost in Area progress as well as a 1.5x Ticket.
- FULL SYNC badges and Collections that require 2 players cannot be obtained in Invitation Play.

2-player mode now awards an extra stamp in Stamp Cards.

When choosing Tour Members in Areas:
- Locking is reintroduced.
- "Auto set" now lets you choose between ascending and descending order of Tour Members' level.

Area progress is now shown on the music select screen, along with the current ticket and DX Pass.

FULL SYNC status is now shown during gameplay.

name: Mokhtar: Uprising Season
description: The 2nd part of the Ambassador of Love trilogy, this PC game narrates a part of Mukhtar Saghafi's life. In this season player as Mukhtar trying to gather people & uprising for a decisive war.

name: Final Fantasy IV: Daughter of Darkness and Light
description:
What if the King of Baron had banished Joanna rather than Cecilia? That Kluya meets Joanna, the two fall in love, and they have a son and a daughter? And that, after tragedy strikes, this daughter ends up been abandoned in the woods… only to be found and raised by the King?

A single ripple becomes a wave that sends a pair of lovers down vastly different life paths. Cecil, the White Wizard. Rosa, the Dark Knight. This is her story–one of redemption from the darkness within.

'Final Fantasy IV: Daughter of Darkness and Light' is a fork of the 'Project II: Final Fantasy IV' hack. Not only does it include the bugfixes, restoration of missing content and revised script of the latter mod, but it also an alternate story with Rosa Farrell as the protagonist.

name: Wet-Dry World
description: A map loosely based on Wet-Dry World from Super Mario 64.

name: Otter Island
description:
Inspired by various classic RPG Maker horror games, like Ib and the Witch's House

It's a warm summer day and Zachary Dove is invited to his friend Connor's summer cottage, along with their other friend, Jeremy.

They are looking forward to a relaxing day of swimming, grilling, and drinking together. Later at night, however, things start to seem strange, and quickly take a turn for the terrifying.

name: Hentai Girls Sliding Puzzle
description: Challenging sliding puzzles with various levels of difficulty, featuring hentai female characters.

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Pristine Realm
description:
Version 5.1 of Honkai Impact 3rd, which includes:
• New Valkyrie: Miss Pink Elf♪
• New Story Chapter XXV-EX: Immortal Blades
• New Elysian Realm Chapter: Flame-Chasers' Trials Chapter 2
• ...and more!

name: Into the Dark
description: Large blue, somewhat E2M5ish fortress with several outside areas and a dark platforming section. The map source is included.

name: G-Mode Archives 38: Mystia2
description:
The second adventure fantasy drawn with gentle colors. The story of the "King's Sword" left by the god of Mystia.

"mystia2" is a fantasy RPG set on the continent of Mystia, one year after the previous work "mystia".

In this work, which consists of all three chapters, the party changes for each chapter.
A large volume of scenarios around the "King's Sword" left by the gods and the "Masty Stone" that manipulates the gods
You can enjoy the world view of "mystia" drawn with gentle colors more deeply.

Like the previous work, it is equipped with convenient functions such as a memo function and an automatic save system.

There are also plenty of rushing elements such as the treasure collection system and "from the beginning as it is strong" that comes out after clearing.
Let's use a wide variety of magic and challenge ourselves to fight against monsters who block our way.

name: Gamedec: Definitive Edition
description: Gamedec is a single-player cyberpunk isometric RPG. You are a game detective, who solves crimes inside virtual worlds. Use your wits to gather info from your witnesses and suspects, getting to the bottom of deceptive schemes. The game continually adapts to your decisions and never judges.

name: Historical Trilogy
description: Klabater’s ‘Historical Trilogy’ contains three meaningful, story-driven & history-inspired games: We. The Revolution, Help Will Come Tomorrow, and The Amazing American Circus. Immerse yourself into plots inspired by momentous historical and political events created with Unique hand-drawn 2D visuals!

name: Eternum
description: Eternum is a choice-based visual novel made in Ren'py with tons of romance, mystery, humor, and much more!

name: Touhou Spell Bubble: Diao ye zong - Song Pack
description:
Popular for beautiful melodies and lyrics that tell a story, we've collected Diao ye zong's songs into the "Diao ye zong Song Pack"!
Indulge your Spell Bubbler soul with these sublime songs!

name: Charade Maniacs for Nintendo Switch
description: Port of the PS Vita game for Nintendo Switch.

name: Candy Scabs
description: It's the Void's birthday! Bring candy and presents, or else...!!

name: Project Ichr
description:
Battle through bullet-hell with cards
Project ICHR is 2D rogue-like shooting with deck-building. Fight your way through the waves of corrupted programs to rescue your team. Every weapon, every item, player can use are from the deck of cards which the player can build while playing.

name: Pool: 8 Ball Billiards
description: "Enjoy Hundreds of amazing pool challenges - test your skills, dexterity, and determination in an epic journey through several snooker tests. Become a master and beat 220+ exciting challenges. Try different types of billiards and choose which suits you best. Test yourself in a duel with Computer AI and show who rules here. Don’t worry if you aren’t pro yet. You have a chance to improve your skills in planned training mode after which the world of billiards will be open for you.

name: Arcade Archives: Soldam
description: Soldam is a puzzle game released by Jaleco in 1992. The game is an elusive puzzle known only to the fairy folk. The core rule of the game is to line up rows of nuts with the same color horizontally to remove them. The puzzle also has a special trick: surrounding other nuts with a pair of nuts of the same color will turn the nuts in the middle into the other color. Use this to make your way through the game!

name: Jigsaw Masterpieces EX: Kawaii Cute Goddesses
description: "Jigsaw Masterpieces" series is a digital jigsaw puzzle game that is easy for anyone to play. Many convenient functions for completing the puzzle, such as the function to separate edge and inner pieces and the auto save function for playing lighthearted at any time. "Jigsaw Masterpieces EX - Kawaii Cute Goddesses -" contains a total of 120 images of 24 cute girls based on mythical goddesses. Each puzzle has three different numbers of pieces, so you can have a lot of fun. There are 70 pieces for everyone, 260 pieces for a bit of challenge, and 400 pieces for the professional level. Which game level do you want to play first? If it is a digital jigsaw puzzle... You don't have to worry about losing the pieces. You don't have to need prepare a large space to suspend the puzzle. Let's have fun playing the jigsaw puzzle with "Jigsaw Masterpieces"!

name: Gamedec: Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
This bundle includes:
Gamedec digital copy
The Art of Gamedec – 80 pages of art and design concepts.
Digital Soundtrack - many minutes of the noir-themed original score.
Exclusive skin of Torkil Aymore - the protagonists known from the Gamedec books saga.

name: Pipe Fitter
description: Pipe fitter is the best brain-teaser for every pipeline puzzle lover. If you are a big fan of pipe connection puzzle, do not miss this great pipeline puzzle game! Everyone can enjoy the fun of plumbing and connecting the right pipes in the right orientation! An amusing, inspiring pipe puzzle experience . All pipe plumbing fans, get ready for your exciting pipe plumbing puzzle journey in over 250 levels! Features : - 250 Levels - Different difficulties - Hint function

name: Mist Train Girls
description: Jump into the world of Mist Train Girls! Collect a harem of military girls and take them on an adventure to rid Iris Cloud of the wicked Mist that envelopes it! Mist Train Girls story-driven RPG, fully-voiced! Take on opponents with a deep, turn-based battle RPG system with unlimited possibilities! The continent of Iris Cloud was shrouded in a thick mist.

name: Speedway Challenge 2021
description: Speedway Challenge 2021 is a 3D speedway game. Feel speedway emotions thanks to realistic riding physics. Play online mode with friends or local in career mode, league mode, challenges, tournament and quick matches. Are you ready for the challenge?

name: Fantasy Match Puzzle
description: Are you ready to test your eyes with Fantasy Match Puzzle, your seek and find skills will be challenged like never before. Develops your secret seeker skill to find objects. This is a puzzle game similar to Hidden Object games, in which you have to find the objects while the clock is ticking.

name: Ji Mo Shen Ming De Xin Yuan Shou Ji
description: What kind of courage and change can the connection between people bring? The story takes place in the ancient eastern country, where a foreign girl from Silazi kingdom got involved with various humans, spirits and even gods. Here, she heard voices unknown to others and met people unknown to others.

name: Atom
description: A simple hydrogen atom simulator.

name: Dumb: Treasure
description: Use a remote-controlled robot to find the treasure lost under the bed.

name: Wraiths of Sentinel
description: Harness the phenomenal abilities of an unliving wraith to preserve liberty—or to subvert it. Will you use your powers over quintessence to save your nation, or will you profit from its broken shell?

name: Fantasy Sliding Puzzle 2
description: Challenging sliding puzzles with various levels of difficulty, featuring epic fantasy female characters and backgrounds.

name: Klondike Re-Imagined
description: Standard 3-card draw Klondike. But with a zillion gizmos to make it tedium-free. If its mundane, the app does it for you! You are just left with the fun stuff. This may be the most advanced solitaire game ever.

name: Voidwalkers: Astora's Darkness
description: You are the chosen, free of all, but in order to transcend, you must be the servant of many. For in order to gain the weak, ye must become the weak. Enter the Void, and walk the path of the Enigma. For many chase a corruptible crown, and you must prove that you are incorruptible.

name: Bloodwash
description: A serial killer is terrorizing the city, and Sara's deadbeat boyfriend hasn't done the laundry. Can Sara survive a late-night trip to the laundromat, or will the Womb Ripper perform an early delivery?

name: Legends of Snooker: One Shot
description: Legends of Snooker: One Shot, is a game that will bring out the best of your snooker skills. The puzzle will challenge you with several possible moves that vary according to your progress in the game.

name: Jujubos
description: Jujubos is a puzzle game that you need to use different tools to build a path until the end and rescue all the Jujubos.

name: Hedgie Simulator
description: Trapped within the offices of a large hedge fund called Sipadel Finance. It's your job to take a sip and make the apes dip.

name: Aquarist: My First Job
description: Get your first job in the Aquarist! Learn how to set up aquarium, decorate it and take care of your fish!

name: How to Volley Ball
description: A simple game about volleyball made by a member of a school volleyball team. Hope you would enjoy it and arouse your interest of volleyball. Maybe one day you would pick up a ball, walk in the court, join in the team and try the real game. I'll be glad to hear that!

name: My Journey to Your World
description: A casual free-to-play puzzle game with randomly scrambled puzzle pieces that can be solved under a certain time to win.

name: Voidwalkers: Soul Hunters
description: Enter the Realm of Astora and fight for redemption in a non-stop battle for glory! Future Knights is a fast-paced dueling simulation where you are pitted against foes in numerous arenas to prove your worth.

name: Lola: The Escape
description: In this challenging action platformer. Help the little cow Lola to escape from the Martians who kidnapped her. Explore and avoid obstacles in each level. Her main ability is to float while she falls.

name: Chigau!!!
description: Mistake romance meta novel game. Catch the heroine.

name: Girlfight 2024
description: GirlFight 2024 is the girl fighting game with physical effects that make realistic boobs movements and clothing destruction systems.

name: Push-Ups Workout
description: Are you ready for the 200 Push-Ups Challenge? Body shaping is always good for our body. These workouts are perfect for men and women, beginners and professionals. Do you want to gain muscles, lose weight, increase strength and stamina? Effective workout plans created by professional fitness coaches will help you to see the results after 1 week! Set a goal for what you want to reach. Don't give up, just follow the training plan. Just simply follow and perform the instructed number of reps, and after 10 weeks, you will be able to do 200 push-ups straight!

name: Maimai DX Universe
description: maimai Deluxe Universe is the third entry of the maimai Deluxe series, successor of the Maimai series. The game is played using touch screen or buttons on a large cabinet with a circular screen.

name: Endless Puzzle Fun Collection
description:
Candy 2048 Challenge:
Test your intelligence in the iconic 2048 game for intense fun! Play in 1-vs-1 multiplayer to really see who is the best!

Yum Yum Line:
Match 5 tiles of the same color, clear lines and make sure you don't get stuck! Fantastic fun for all ages. Challenge a friend and play on the same screen in the local battle mode.

name: Find Love or Die Trying
description:
Date or die in this battle royale dating sim visual novel!

I'm your host Kat, and this is Find Love or Die Trying!

It's the premiere of our new dating show, where ending up single... means ending up dead! Not sure why you'd sign up for this, but now that you're here, you've got 7 days to get one of the lovely ladies on your tropical island getaway to fall in love in with you. If she's willing to put a ring on it, you're both free to leave. If not... well, it's in the name of the show!

name: Erannorth Chronicles
description: Erannorth Chronicles is an old-school sandbox RPG/Card Game with focus in Deck-Building freedom and Character Customization.

name: Beta Escape
description: Escape room inspired game. Solve puzzles, alone or with your friend, just like in your favorite escape room!

name: Imprisoned Queen
description: The "Imprisoned Queen" is a game combining imprisonment, training and medieval style for the Queen's Glory series. Decades after the death of Queen Alisa, the powerful Kingdom of Norman invaded Keter. And they imprisoned Shane, the Queen of Keter. What will Shane's fate become...

name: Rainbow Reactor: Fusion
description: Get ready for a puzzling adventure at the Rainbow Reactor - where story-driven exploration is fused together with frantic color-matching gameplay!

name: Dwarves Craft. Mountain Brothers
description: 150 colored nonograms with popular themes! Dwarves Craft - Mountain Brothers — Uncover hidden pictures!

name: Rift Adventure
description: Rift Adventure is a pixelart platform in a magical world full of adventures and with a functional tax system, it is up to the player, to walk beyond his own future as an adventurer, the future of the city's development.

name: Murder Diaries
description: Figure out what happened, explore fascinating yet almost surreal landscapes and enjoy the thrilling storytelling. Collect pieces of the story while freely floating through related environments and immerse yourself into an intriguing story filled with blood and murder unlike you have ever seen before

name: Dark Runner
description: Parkour, speedrun and darkness. This combination is quite a challenge. Unique lighting mechanics like you've never seen before are the main reason you'll want this game to never end.

name: BanG Dream! Girls Band Party! for Nintendo Switch
description:
Popular rhythm game in Japan!
Tap to the rhythm of over 200 songs to choose from.
Play both original and cover songs from popular J-Pop artists and anime songs!
Play your favorite songs on a level of difficulty that suits you!

name: Since Memories: Off the Starry Sky
description:
The main character "Junya Mizumoto" helps his family's business "Mizumoto-dou" while attending university. His heart is bind to his older brother Takaya, who died last year.

"Why did I survive?"

One day, he meets a girl. "I wish you're the one who died," she says, before disappearing without telling herself identity.

After that, Junya's childhood friend "Chihaya Houjou" comes in with a project to renovate the old Houjou family house. It would be the first big job for Junya to take charge. He was confused by the series of firsts. How he will face the task that he cannot accomplish alone? The various people he meets through the job... Junya is at the mercy of many problems and conflicts caused by their respective emotions.

Will he be able to successfully renovate the old Houjou house?
Who is that girl?

The fate tied to his older brother’s death is about to begin…

name: Amamane 2: Premium Edition
description:
The Premium edition comes with:
- PS4 Game: Amamane 2
- B2 Tapestry
- Short Story
- Original Soundtrack

name: Amamane 2
description: Daiki Matsuzaki is said to be a candidate for the ace pitcher of the baseball team, but due to a trauma caused by an injury, he can no longer throw the ball.

name: Neptunia x Senran Kagura: Ninja Wars
description:
A world where all ninja gather "Game Ninja World"
A conflict between two feudal lords of each land over the control of the country, a spark between two major powers leading two ninja schools.
The "Konpa School" mastered of "Command Technique" style, while the "Hanipa School" mastered of "Action Technique".
The two camps were fighting when suddenly a machine ninja army attacked using a "Shoot Technique" style.
Machine ninja army already invades a small country, and its head "You Geima" announced to the world.
The start of the "Super NINJA War" that decides the strongest school in the world!

name: The Amazing American Circus
description: The Amazing American Circus tells a story of the most iconic entertainment in American history. The USA, during the Gilded Age, is a turbulent place. On the East Coast springs up a modern metropolis, while in the west, cowboys and robber barons fight for their business. The new era is coming, and this is the last right moment for the circus to flourish!

name: I Am Fish
description: I Am Fish is a charming adventure starring four intrepid fish friends, forcibly separated from their home in a pet shop fish tank. Throughout the game, players will join them as they swim, fly, roll, and chomp their way to the open ocean from the far-flung corners of Barnardshire (the smallest county in England) in their bid for freedom and to reunite once again.

name: Gamedec
description: Gamedec is an adaptive cyberpunk RPG. As a private detective, it’s your job to solve crimes inside virtual worlds. What decisions will you make in a world where child slavery is a F2P game, where murder over a game-clan dispute is an every-day reality? Who will you become in the XXII century?

name: Tails of Iron
description: Tails of Iron is an Adventure RPG-lite game set in a charming and brutal world. Playing as Redgi the Rat, you are heir to the throne when your kingdom is raided by the Iron Frog. Players face challenging, tactical and stunning combat encounters in order to rebuild the Rat Kingdom.

name: Skatebird
description: Drop in, and be a skateboarding bird. Grind on bendy straws, kickflip over staplers, and carve killer lines through a cardboard and sticky tape world. Skatebird can't fly, but on a board, they soar.

name: Clash of Chefs VR
description: Clash of Chefs VR is a delicious cook-off game. Prepare the tastiest meals the fastest you can. Enjoy unique VR game with no motion sickness. Test your skills in the kitchens of the world each featuring new recipes and 20 challenging single player levels. Clash with other chefs in online multiplayer.

name: Family Vacation 2: Road Trip
description: The Simmons family is at it again... they're taking their camper, hooking it up to their SUV and going on a cross-country camping adventure! You'll be asked to help pack and get everything they’ll need on their trip and enjoy all that Mother Nature has to offer. Travel through Montana, Idaho, Colorado and more. Visit the most wonderful natural attractions in the world; Yellowstone Park, the Grand Canyon and even catch a glimpse of a UFO near Area 51. Camp out under the stars and get back to nature in this family-friendly Road Trip adventure! - Over 60 hidden object locations - Over 25 themed mini-games and puzzles - Beautiful art and design for all locations - Life-like animations and realistic sound effects - Fully customized controls for Nintendo Switch

name: Eastward
description:
Eastward is a beautifully detailed and charming adventure RPG, from Shanghai-based indie developers, Pixpil and published by Chucklefish.

Escape the tyrannical clutches of a subterranean society and join Eastward’s unlikely duo on an exciting adventure to the land above! Discover beautiful yet bizarre settlements and make new friends as you travel across the world by rail.

Inspired by 90s Japanese animation, the visual style of Eastward has been brought to life using a combination of a modern, innovative 3D lighting system and a rich retro-pixel artwork.

name: Cinderella After 4
description: Yukiko, the main character, whose only hobby is to drink tea elegantly at an old-fashioned cafe every Saturday. One day, she makes friends with a cute girl at the cafe. But something is wrong with her... she always disappears somewhere around 4pm...

name: Twerk Race 3D
description: Meet Twerk Race 3D—an exciting runner featuring a fun race where your goal is to build your muscles to become a twerking legend! Run, overcome various obstacles, and fight for the title of the best twerk dancer in history in this super exciting runner.

name: Get Out of My Store!
description:
Your store is being invaded by some weird invaders during the end of October... Beats me! Who knows what these thugs are up to!?

8 different type of monsters are waiting to haunt you and eat your food. Disaster!

Unlock better weapons, and fight protecting your burgers!

Shoot them up, and try to survive all 20 nights!

Get Out Of My Store! is an arcade inspired top-down shooter where the objective is to survive enemy raids and get to the end. Every night is more difficult than the last, and new wacky monsters keep appearing until the very end.

Can you survive all the nights? Refine your abilities, beat your hi-score, and triumphantly defend your store!

name: Paper Mario: Dark Star Edition
description: Paper Mario: Dark Star Edition is a mod for Paper Mario created by ShadeBlade that adds a lot of new content to the game and increases the difficulty. Some of the content (various badge and enemy sprites and maps) was taken from Master Quest, but most of it is entirely new. This mod is meant to be about as difficult as Master Quest Jr, but there are badges that increase the health and damage of enemies.

name: Dessert DIY
description:
Make sweet ice cream, popsicles, and waffles using your creativity in one of the best dessert decorating games!

Experience the satisfaction of preparing your customers' orders with your own hands, meeting their expectations, and witnessing their delightful reactions! Explore a variety of delicious molds, creams, syrups, and sweet ingredients to create mouthwatering works of art!

Does your customer want to take revenge on someone? Prepare yucky desserts with surprise bugs or chili peppers! Such a taste is definitely something no one will ever forget!

Every dessert sold brings you coins, a delightful reward that you can invest in enhancing the appearance of your store. Change the colors of your walls or floor, and add new furniture. Transform your store into a cozy and professional haven, all while having fun!

Ready to get your hands dirty and make unique, colorful desserts?

name: Hex Survivor
description:
Hex Survivor is a tactical match 3 gem game where you should survive as long as possible to get more scores and unlock new upgrades and classes.
Choose the best purchase and upgrade combination to survive more.

name: Taffy Tales
description: In “Taffy Tales” you will see the story of a regular guy with a split personality and his journey in a small town where almost every common citizen has his uncommon dark side. Dozens of characters with their families and relations, an original story, lots of side quests and a lot of adult art awaits you!​

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Centrella Sub Division
description: Located in the United States, the Centrella Sub Division runs through the mountains to the countryside, with 5 yards, 40 miles of mainline and 4 branchlines, many industries, and passenger stations. At least 50 trains uses this track as a shortcut to go east/west, with two amtrak trains per day.

name: Two Clusters Cold Haven
description: Nicholas is a mercenary who takes on a seemingly simple job which drags him through more troubles than he expects.

name: Doomsday: Last Survivors
description: Doomsday: Last Survivors is a zombie survival strategy game with multiplayer online competition and real-time strategy elements. Set in a near future where zombies have taken over the world, survivors must fight for their lives and for the future of humanity. As the Commander, it's your duty to lead your fellow survivors to build their Shelter, explore fog-filled areas, and fight the zombies and rival factions! Enjoy zombie games, survival games, and strategy games? Doomsday: Last Survivors has got you covered!

name: The Building 71 Incident
description: Play the VHS tape left by an employee of Building 71 as they delve into a mystery they never expected to unveil.

name: Mr. Pumpkin Series Bundle
description: CottonGame's empty-headed protagonist is back for a new round of puzzle-filled fun in Mr. Pumpkin 2: Walls of Kowloon! This bundle contains Mr. Pumpkin 2 and Mr. Pumpkin‘s first Adventure.

name: Metal Slug 1st & 2nd Mission Double Pack
description: METAL SLUG 1ST MISSION released in 1999 for the NEOGEO POCKET COLOR, with its sequel METAL SLUG 2ND MISSION hitting shelves in 2000.

name: Dustwind: The Last Resort
description: Roam a post-apocalyptic world as a nameless heroine and fight for your survival in the desolate Wastelands! Experience the moving single-player campaign in the real-time tactical action game Dustwind - The Last Resort. Find weapons, develop your character, defend yourself against looters and become the Wastelands' new leader!

name: Jaksaljabi
description: Jaksaljabi is a kinetic novel that you can experience unique set-up and story.

name: Grim Wanderings II
description: This game combines a deep role-playing system inspired by classic board games and a full-fledged 4X strategy

name: DCS World: Mosquito FB VI
description: One of the most revolutionary and effective combat aircraft of WWII, the British de Havilland Mosquito was in service with the Royal Air Force (RAF) from 1940 to 1961.

name: The Research Age Deluxe
description: In a time of turmoil and decay, a dark organization named INPLANT Industries and based in Harsh Town, casts its shadow over the world with it's sinister agenda.

name: Slime's Journey
description: A mini metroidvania with retro style graphics about a Slime who have his parents took by an Evil Shaman, and now fight against lots of magical creatures to get them back!

name: 100 Hidden Cups
description: The strange cups are hidden on the paper. A difficult adventure for the eyes.

name: Motorcycle Biker Simulator: Motorcycle 4
description: Motorcycle Biker Simulator, Motorcycle #4

name: Cyberdunk: Anime Edition
description: Cute waifu are ready to thank you for your help, hero. Quickly save the city from enemies to free all of them.

name: Flower girl
description: Flower girl is a magic theme elimination game. In order to save the beloved, players set foot on the way to the legendary flower demon country. On the way, they encounter all kinds of flower demons. It's up to you to destroy them or capture them.

name: Paradox in the mirror
description: Easy-to-play 2D pixel art single-player action game There are only three buttons to use: "Jump", "Right", and "Left". It's difficult, but if you don't give up and keep trying, you'll definitely be able to pave the way. A girl who got lost in a mysterious world

name: Pegasus: Broken Wings
description: Follow a new set of events involving Pegasus-5 crew with them being stuck in a city under curfew after a terrorist attack and getting entangled in a massive conspiracy. Stick close to your allies, build romantic relations, and make important choices.

name: Break
description: A new and nostalgic suspension action game is about to begin. You and them, let's go on an adventure!

name: Starfighter Aces
description: Massive battles rage in the stars! As a new pilot in the Allied Starfighter Corps, help turn the tide against a ruthless enemy. Hundreds of ships struggle to achieve victory in huge, team-based missions. Shoot down fighters, torpedo star cruisers, and duel famed enemy aces!

name: Tomb Rumble: Cursed Sorcerer
description: The curse of the Sorcerer falls upon you: Reincarnate as a sparkling Sorcerer and get your revenge on other adventurers by unleashing deadly spells! Ranging from mobility to cosmetic or offensive spells, the sorcerer is a careful but polyvalent curse!

name: Tomb Rumble: Cursed Vampire
description: The curse of the Vampire falls upon you Succumb to a mysterious cloaked figure's bit and reincarnate as a vengeful but classy Vampire!

name: Hidden Objects: Cartoon Fantasy
description: Are you ready to test your eyes with Hidden Objects - Cartoon Fantasy, your seek and find skills will be challenged like never before. Develops your secret seeker skill to find objects. This is a puzzle game similar to Hidden Object games.

name: Hot and Lovely 4
description: A very interesting puzzle game. You need to remember the different pictures by flipping the cards, and find the same pictures to eliminate.

name: ReturnHome
description: ReturnHome is a puzzle adventure game.You will become the hero to pass through 5 themes, "City of Fire", "North of the Desert","Land of Strife", "Land of Fish and Rice", "City of Wealthy", find out the security of your origins after many obstacles.

name: Dance of Cubes
description: A casual logic puzzle in the style of cellular automata. Features a 3D top down view and casual music. The objective is to place automaton cubes, hit play and by simulation of the cubes crush all the glass mushrooms.

name: Knight and Princess
description: The legend says "Only the most skillful players can beat the dragon" so I challenge you, are you the true Knight?Take up the challenge and save the Princess.

name: Captures II
description: A chess-based puzzle game.

name: Spookity Hollow
description: Spookity Hollow is a ghastly third-person sandbox game created for young children (Ages 4+) which encourages curiosity and role-play.

name: Lenny Loosejocks Goes Walkabout
description: Guide Lenny Loosejocks as he goes Walkabout in the Australian outback. It's the groundbreaking original Lenny Loosejocks web adventure in all its pixelated glory - exactly like you remember playing when you got home from school in 1997.

name: The Forgotten Phobia
description: The Forgotten Phobia is a horror puzzle game made in 2D pixel graphics.

name: Selfmade Devil
description: Selfmade Devil is a casual semi-paced casual game with a rich variety of magic objects, enemies, and maps. Play as the demon king in the mysterious girl under the guidance of the cultivation of magic ability, transformation of the demon king city. Improve the efficiency of material acquisition to create a powerful demon king army to invade human territory!

name: Follow The Cat
description: "Follow The Cat" is a single-player first-person physics-based puzzler. You make your path through story, manipulating shapes and solving physics-based challenges set in visually designed places.

name: Pots and Potions
description: A game about crafting potions with the craziest effects against the clock (and your mates).

name: Chicken Duty
description: You've agreed to watch over the neighbor's chicken while they're away, and now you must lead it to safety as quick as possible!

name: Hide Seek Survive
description: Experience true horror as you move from room to room, looking for a doll that can get you out of the most dangerous game of hide and seek ever played. Be careful though because there is something in the house looking for you as well...

name: Eden
description: Eden is a world full of adventure, exploration, creation, and play. Come join us as we create the world together.

name: Into the Metaverse: Theme Park Dark Ride Experience
description: Into the Metaverse is a VR Dark Ride Pilot about humanity's quest for ever deeper immersion showing scenes from the past, present and future. VR may be the ultimate Dark Ride tech. This is a 10 minute polished Dark Ride "Pilot" that will leave you wanting more.

name: SamuraiRising
description:
RisingSun powers the greatest play to earn NFT card game ecosystem on the Binance Smart Chain. Over 4 billion collectable samurai battle cards make for one of the most unique gaming experiences on blockchain.
In SamuraiRising you bring your samurai cards to battle and fight against other players or a bot to earn $INF. SamuraiRising provides utility and value to the entire RisingSun ecosystem. Players that perform well and are committed to regularly playing are rewarded most.

name: Classic Logical Bundle
description: Classic Logical Bundle is a bundle of Beat the Four, The Mines, Reversi Rulez, and Tic'o'Toe. This bundle is sure to bring you back to the yesteryear of gaming. So put your feet up and get ready to experience the classics of gaming, alone or with a friend!

name: Ruins of Albion
description: Explore the procedurally generated world and test your skills in a fast-paced combat combining ranged and melee attacks. Defeat a variety of different enemies and bosses, fight in the arena, collect upgrades and unlock different arrow and trap abilities in this small rogue-like action-adventure.

name: Motorcycle Biker Simulator
description: Motorbiker Physics Simulator is Physics Based Motorcycle Simulation Game.

name: Neutron and the Tri-Spark
description: Neutron is an action maze runner where you will guide our hero on an adventure to collect the energy orbs of the Tri-Spark while avoiding capture by the security bots.

name: Star Wars: Tales from the Galaxy's Edge - Last Call
description:
In Star Wars: Tales from the Galaxy’s Edge, fans play a droid repair technician who crashed on planet Batuu after a pirate attack. In typical Star Wars fashion, you get swept up in a grand adventure, proving that anyone can become a hero. Part I is available now on the Oculus Store.

With Last Call, fans will continue their adventures in the Outer Rim, taking on unexpected alliances and deadly enemies alike. Players will experience more eras and places in the Star Wars galaxy through Seezelslak’s legendary Tales and so much more in this epic conclusion.

name: Match 3 Adventure Collection
description:
Match Three: Pirates! Heir to Davy Jones:
Davy Jones created a world where no-one gets old and unsuspecting people are tricked into entering Davy Jones’ Locker. Journey through the different stages of this match 3 adventure, and lift the curse of Davy Jones!

Gems of Magic: Lost Family:
Discover this mystical enchanted forest in a calm and relaxing world of spirits and magic. But a dark cloud is forming over the forest and Hurricane has kidnapped the Fuzzy family. It's now time to help the magic creatures to save the Fuzzy family and restore the enchanted forest!

name: Astro Ace
description: ASTRO ACE is a retro-style addictive arcade space shooter. From the distant universe, an evil alien fleet is invading the solar system. You will have to ride a powerful spaceship and fight against endless waves of enemies.

name: Between Time: Escape Room
description: You are going to steal a time machine. In this escape room, you have to travel through time, explore mysterious places and solve puzzles to get priceless treasures. Will you be able to make it back alive?

name: Dog's Donuts
description: Crazy machines, donuts, and a cute husky! Welcome to DOGNUTS!

name: Explosive Candy World
description: Forget about running and jumping. In Explosive Candy World you have to EXPLODE your way to the end of the level!

name: Tomb Rumble
description: Tomb Rumble is a pixel art MMO platformer, where adventurers compete to retreive ancient treasures in lost temples, cursed ruins and more. Push other players into deadly traps to be the first to escape !... or be the one to fall in a lava pit.
